name: Magic Academy's Bastard Instructor
summary: Synopsis   “Shit, why this guy!?”Of all the unique characters he could’ve transmigrated as, it had to be the bastard instructor.Vanitas Astrea.A third-rate middle game boss, who was dismissed from the University after severe allegations, losing his teaching profession and ultimately, exiled from the Empire.“.....How did I even get here!?”Vanitas must now circumvent his way around this new world, confront his past, mend broken relationships, and prevent looming tragedies that would lead to his demise.——————————————More illustrations in the server.Discord: .gg/zukKB2ppDp     General Audiences
author: athex
